metadata.title: CVE-2018-16742 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in mgetty before 1.2.1. In contrib/scrts.c, astack-based buffer overflow can be triggered via a command-line parameter.

criterions.comment: mgetty: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
